people_met.name: Marlen Voss
people_met.notes: Guild scribe; confirmed internal mole. Responsible for misfiling and marking records tied to beastkin trafficking using a distinctive ink smear. Access revoked quietly; currently unaware she has been exposed. Being used as bait to identify the wider smuggling network and her contacts.

people_met.name: Vellin Arcos
people_met.notes: senior Guild scribe overseeing the Westbridge Annex investigation. Independently confirms Jayson's findings through ledger analysis. Authorizes travel clearance and conditional escort permissions regarding Liri. Operates with procedural caution and discretion.

people_met.name: Guild Marshal Hartrow
people_met.notes: Westbridge Annex Guild Marshal. Receives Jayson's intelligence regarding internal corruption and trafficking. Initiates quiet containment actions against Marlen Voss and the associated smuggling ring. Authorizes investigation while minimizing information leaks.

notes: Destroying a Watcher triggers an audit, which attracts entities with broader authority and fewer questions
